Title: Establishes the New York state school safety and security act
Summary: Establishes the New York state school safety and security act; establishes the office of school safety and security to perform assessments of educational facilities for safety and security and provide safety and security training; establishes the school safety and security advisory board to establish school safety and security best practices and resources; imposes a one percent tax on mobile sports wagering to fund such office.
LawCode: Add Art 3 Part 2 §§150 - 152, Ed L; amd §1367, RWB L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law and the racing, pari-mutuel wagering and breeding law, in relation to establishing the New York state school safety and security act
